member.name: T:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1
member.summary: A simple disk-backed queue using ManagedEsent

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.#ctor(System.String,EsentQueue.StartOption)
member.summary: A simple disk-backed queue using ManagedEsent
member.param: The path to the folder where all files will be stored.
The start option, Create New or Open Existing.

member.name: P:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of elements in the queue.
member.value: The number of elements contained in the queue.

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.Enqueue(`0)
member.summary: Adds an object to the end of the Queue.
member.param: The object to add to the Queue. It must be serializable

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.Dequeue
member.summary: Removes and returns the object at the beginning of the Queue.
member.returns: The object that is removed from the beginning of the Queue

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.TryDequeue(`0@)
member.summary: Removes the object at the beginning of the Queue, and copies it to the result parameter.
member.returns: true if the object is successfully removed; false if the Queue is empty

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.Peek
member.summary: Returns the object at the beginning of the Queue without removing it.
member.returns: The object at the beginning of the Queue.

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.TryPeek(`0@)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether there is an object at the beginning of the Queue, and if one is present, copies it to the result parameter. The object is not removed from the Queue.
member.param: If present, the object at the beginning of the Queue; otherwise, the default value of T.
member.returns: true if there is an object at the beginning of the Queue; false if the Queue is empty.

member.name: M:EsentQueue.PersistentQueue`1.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:EsentQueue.StartOption
member.summary: Options to define on start of the queue

member.name: F:EsentQueue.StartOption.OpenOrCreate
member.summary: Open an existing database or create a new one if not.
